file_content.text: Enemy troops broke through the lines! They're trying to take the Gravestone!
Senya and I are close. We won't let them take the ship!
Arcann and I are at the Gravestone.
Welcome back to the land of the living, Senya.
Good to hear your voice.
It's good to be back.
Can you and Arcann hold your positions?
How bad is it, Senya?
We can try, but without reinforcements...
We can't lose the Gravestone... We're on our way!
They're swarming me! I need more time!
I'm on it. Got the Gravestone in my sights!
Area's secure, Commander... for now.
Another wave incoming.
Heads up. Got some uninvited guests.
They'll send reinforcements as long as the Gravestone is grounded. Finish those upgrades, now!
I want that ship in the air!
Working on it, but someone needs to help Theron keep 'em off me.
Great idea! Why didn't I think of that? Here's another great idea! Help Theron keep 'em off me!
Hold fast. Lana and I are on the way.
We're coming to help.
Theron, can you hold your position?
How bad is it, Theron?
Not for long. Gonna need some reinforcements.
We have to hurry. Without the Gravestone, the battle is already lost.
Working on it, but someone needs to help Senya keep 'em off me.
Great idea! Why didn't I think of that? Here's another great idea! Help Senya keep 'em off me.
Last time we met, you were in a coma.
Senya? Is that you?
I thought you were going to sleep through this entire war.
About time you woke up.
I awoke when I sensed Vaylin break her father's chains.
And now I get to thank you for all you've done for me--and for Arcann. It's time to repay our debt.
Look at it this way: at least I'm well rested.
